pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā bhikkhū vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti—dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.4: Atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi—“etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā—dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ. Kena nu kho mayaṃ upāyena samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vaseyyāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilameyyāmā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.5: Ekacce evamāhaṃsu—“handa mayaṃ, āvuso, gihīnaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhema. Evaṃ te amhākaṃ dātuṃ maññissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.6: Evaṃ mayaṃ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.7: Ekacce evamāhaṃsu—“alaṃ, āvuso, kiṃ gihīnaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhitena?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.8: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, gihīnaṃ dūteyyaṃ harāma. Evaṃ te amhākaṃ dātuṃ maññissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.9: Evaṃ mayaṃ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.10: Ekacce evamāhaṃsu—“alaṃ, āvuso; kiṃ gihīnaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhitena. Kiṃ gihīnaṃ dūteyyaṃ haṭena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.11: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissāma—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.12: ‘asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu dutiyassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu tatiyassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu catutthassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu sotāpanno, asuko bhikkhu sakadāgāmī, asuko bhikkhu anāgāmī, asuko bhikkhu arahā, asuko bhikkhu tevijjo, asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.14: Evaṃ mayaṃ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.15: “Eso yeva kho, āvuso, seyyo, yo amhākaṃ gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.16: Atha kho te bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.17: “asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī …pe… asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.18: Atha kho te manussā—“lābhā vata no, suladdhaṃ vata no, yesaṃ no evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā, na vata no ito pubbe evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā, yathayime bhikkhū sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.19: Te na tādisāni bhojanāni attanā bhuñjanti, mātāpitūnaṃ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṃ denti ñātisālohitānaṃ denti yādisāni bhikkhūnaṃ denti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.20: Na tādisāni khādanīyāni sāyanīyāni pānāni attanā khādanti sāyanti pivanti mātāpitūnaṃ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṃ denti ñātisālohitānaṃ denti, yādisāni bhikkhūnaṃ denti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.21: Atha kho te bhikkhū vaṇṇavā ahesuṃ pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.1: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṃvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena vesālī tena pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.3: Anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṃ kūṭāgārasālā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhū kisā honti lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.6: Vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.7: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.8: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.10: kacci samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.12: Samaggā ca mayaṃ, bhante, sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasimhā, na ca piṇḍakena kilamimhā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.13: Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.14: Kālaṃ viditvā pucchanti, kālaṃ viditvā na pucchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.17: Dvīhākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti—“dhammaṃ vā desessāma, sāvakānaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.18: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—“yathā kathaṃ pana tumhe, bhikkhave, samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.19: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.23: kathañhi nāma tumhe, bhikkhave, udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.25: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.26: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya bhūtasmiṃ, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.6: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā, avaseso anupasampanno nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.8: jhānaṃ, vimokkho, samādhi, samāpatti, ñāṇadassanaṃ, maggabhāvanā, phalasacchikiriyā, kilesappahānaṃ, vinīvaraṇatā cittassa, suññāgāre abhirati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.10: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.12: suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.14: suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.16: suññatā samāpatti, animittā samāpatti, appaṇihitā samāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.20: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.22: sotāpattiphalassa sacchikiriyā, sakadāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā, anāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā, arahattassa sacchikiriyā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.24: rāgassa pahānaṃ, dosassa pahānaṃ, mohassa pahānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.26: rāgā cittaṃ vinīvaraṇatā, dosā cittaṃ vinīvaraṇatā, mohā cittaṃ vinīvaraṇatā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.28: paṭhamena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, dutiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, tatiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, catutthena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.2: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjin”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.4: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjāmī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.6: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpanno”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.8: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhimhī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.10: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamassa jhānassa vasimhī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.12: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ sacchikataṃ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.16: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; catutthassa jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; catutthaṃ jhānaṃ sacchikataṃ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.23: appaṇihitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; appaṇihitassa samādhissa lābhimhi, vasimhi; appaṇihito samādhi sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.27: appaṇihitaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; appaṇihitāya samāpattiyā lābhimhi, vasimhi; appaṇihitā samāpatti sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.29: anupasampannassa— “tisso vijjā samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ lābhimhi, vasimhi; tisso vijjā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.33: cattāro iddhipāde samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ lābhimhi, vasimhi; cattāro iddhipādā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.36: pañca balāni samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; pañcannaṃ balānaṃ lābhimhi, vasimhi; pañca balāni sacchikatāni mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.38: anupasampannassa— “satta bojjhaṅge samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ lābhimhi, vasimhi; satta bojjhaṅgā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.40: anupasampannassa— “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.45: arahattaṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; arahattassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; arahattaṃ sacchikataṃ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.49: moho me catto, vanto, mutto, pahīno, paṭinissaṭṭho, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.53: mohā me cittaṃ vinīvaraṇan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.58: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; suññāgāre catutthaṃ jhānaṃ sacchikataṃ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.2: anupasampannassa— “paṭhamañca jhānaṃ dutiyañca jhānaṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṃ dutiyañca jhānaṃ sacchikataṃ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.5: paṭhamañca jhānaṃ catutthañca jhānaṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṃ catutthañca jhānaṃ sacchikataṃ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.12: appaṇihitañca samādhiṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa appaṇihitassa ca samādhissa lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṃ appaṇihito ca samādhi sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.16: appaṇihitañca samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa appaṇihitāya ca samāpattiyā lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṃ appaṇihitā ca samāpatti sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.18: anupasampannassa— “paṭhamañca jhānaṃ tisso ca vijjā samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa tissannañca vijjānaṃ lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṃ tisso ca vijjā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.25: pañca ca balāni samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa pañcannañca balānaṃ lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṃ pañca ca balāni sacchikatāni mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
